What makes me valuable to you

1

Collaboration

I am able to communicate effectively at all levels inside & outside of your organization. This ensures project goal's are understood and implemented in an effective manner. As a medical device representative I sold solutions to my customer's pain points. As a developer I now have the oportunity to build those solutions for you and your customers.

2

Ability To Learn

The ability to learn is one thing but the ability to learn then apply those skills is far superior. My portfolio is filled with examples of my incremental knowledge being built and applied to projects. I will continue this tradition by quickly learning your onboarding proceedures and implement them as my best practices.

3

Passion

Producing great work comes from having strong passion. The move from a lucrative sales job to starting in a new industry was not a product of necessity. It was driven by my desire to express creativity through the code I write and the effect it has on people who use it.

4

Putting In The Time

I wasn't a top 5% sales rep because I was naturally talented at sales. I got there by outworking 95% of my collegues every single day. My work ethic and persistence is what makes me different. It is also what makes me a valueable asset to your organization.
